prompt_base: photorealistic portrait of a lean and muscular young woman, short black spiky hair, determined eyes, extreme muscle definition, battle-ready expression, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: extreme muscle definition, visible veins on arms and abdomen, detailed fabric weave on crop top and skirt, individual hair strands, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, doll, flat lighting, low quality, overly bulky muscles, (too masculine:1.2), soft features, long hair
